titleStmt.title: The letter of the French King, to the Parliament of Roan, concerning the death of the Marshall D'Ancre Together with an act of the saide Parliament thereupon.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1610-1643 : Louis XIII)
Louis XIII, King of France, 1601-1643.
France. Parlement (Normandy). Proceedings. 1617-04-26.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Nathanael Newbery; and are to be sould at his shop vnder St. Peters in Corne-hill, and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Letter dated at end "Paris, this xxiiii. of Aprill. 1617". The Act dated at end "Roan in the said Court of Parliament, the xxvj. of Aprill. 1617".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop vnder St. Peters in Corne-hill
